game.description: Find the lost treasure in the ancient temple.
game.objective: Retrieve the sacred artifact from the temple's depths

tasks.description: Expedite through the treacherous swamp to uncover the entrance.
tasks.objective: Discover a hidden path to the temple.

tasks.description: Overcome ancient puzzles in the underground chambers.
tasks.objective: Solve the riddles and bypass traps.

tasks.description: Uncover the artifact by revealing its hidden chamber.
tasks.objective: Unveil the hidden chamber and claim the artifact.

game.title: The Quest for the Ancient Temple's Lost Relic
